comments.body:
This will affect every room auto complete field on rocket.chat, not only the one in the create discussion modal.
I don't know if that's ok or not.

I think that's ok considering that currently we filter rooms in autocomplete by the `name` field, BUT discussions' "real names" are stored in the `fname` field (`name` only stores a code in discussions).
So I guess that currently autocomplete is not efficient to find discussions (which means this change would just remove these discussions' codes from the autocomplete). What do you think?
